name: I Will Take Your Eyes
description:
Originally created for the 23rd GM45 game jam taking 23rd overall: https://gm48.net/game/637/i-will-take-your-eyes

---

After a deal with a shady demon, you are given great power at the cost of your sight. Fight through nine unique levels using only your ninja senses...

Thanks to:

  • Pyrocheese: Beautiful high-tes humming
  • My Cousin Olivia: Moral support

At first I wasn't feeling this one, but it turned out okay in the end. It has a little less character than my other work since I was mostly uninspired by the theme but I ultimately had fun!

I hope you enjoy!
